deploy.abapAppDescLength: Deployment Description should not exceed 60 characters
deploy.abapTransportNumRequired: Provide a transport request for your application
deploy.abapInvalidNamespace: Namespace invalid as there are too many forward slashes
deploy.abapInvalidAppNameLength: Application name limited to 15 characters, entered {{length}}
deploy.abapInvalidAppName: Application name needs to be prefixed with [{{prefix}}]
deploy.charactersForbiddenInAppName: Only alphanumeric, underscore and slash characters are allowed
deploy.invalidAppNameMultipleReason: Application name is invalid for multiple reasons:

ui5.namespaceMustStartWithLetter: The namespace must start with a letter
ui5.namespaceEndInPeriod: The namespace cannot end with a period
ui5.namespaceNumberAfterPeriod: A number cannot follow a period in the namespace
ui5.lowerAlphaNumericOnly: Please use lowercase alpha numeric characters only
ui5.lowerAlphaNumericDotsOnly: Please use lowercase alpha numeric characters and dots only for the namespace.
ui5.namespaceSpecialCharacter: The namespace can only contain letters, digits, dots, and underscores
ui5.moduleNameMustStartWithLetter: The module name must start with a letter
ui5.nameCombinedTooLong: The combined length of the namespace and module name must not exceed {{length}} characters
ui5.folderDoesNotExist: Folder does not exist. Please enter the root folder for your project
ui5.folderDoesNotHaveCorrectPermissions: Selected folder does not have required permissions. Please ensure you have permission to write to the selected folder and try again.
ui5.nameNotString: Module name must be a string
ui5.nameLengthZero: Module name's length must be greater than zero
ui5.nameStartsWithPeriod: Module name cannot start with a period
ui5.nameStartsWithUnderscore: Module name cannot start with an underscore
ui5.nameStartsOrEndsWithSpace: Module name cannot contain leading or trailing spaces
ui5.nameTooLong: Module name cannot contain more than {{length}} characters
ui5.nameTooShort: Module name must be at least {{length}} characters
ui5.nameContainsSpecialCharacters: Module name cannot contain special characters ("~'!()*)
ui5.nameNotUrlFriendly: Module name can only contain URL-friendly characters
ui5.moduleAlreadyExists: The module folder named: {{folderName}} already exists at the specified path

general.invalidClient: [{{client}}] is invalid. Leave empty or enter value between 000-999
general.invalidValueForSpecialChars: Input must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters or the following symbols: '-','_','$' and '.'

adp.projectNameUppercaseError: The name cannot contain uppercase letters.
adp.projectNameLengthErrorExt: The name cannot contain more than 61 characters or end with 'component'.
adp.projectNameValidationErrorExt: The name must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters. Different parts can be separated by period and every part must start with a letter.
adp.duplicatedProjectName: Project with this name already exists in your workspace
adp.projectNameLengthErrorInt: The name cannot start with 'customer' or contain more than 61 characters or end with 'component'.
adp.projectNameValidationErrorInt: The name must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters and it must have at least two parts. The different parts must be separated by period and every part must start with a letter.
adp.differentNamespaceThanProjectName: Namespace should be the same as Project Name.
adp.namespaceSameAsProjectNameError: Namespace should be the same as Project Name.
adp.namespaceLengthError: Namespace cannot contain more than 61 characters or end with 'component'.
adp.namespaceValidationError: The namespace must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters. Different parts can be separated by period and every part must start with a letter.
adp.achMandatoryError: Application Component Hierarchy can contain only capital letters, digits, and dashes.
adp.invalidAbapRepository: Repository name does not match the expected format. Expected format is '/<namespace>/<repository_name>'  or just a single repository name as a string. Namespace can be up to 8 symbols and repository name can be up to 15 symbols. Only alphanumeric and _ symbols are allowed

package.invalidFormat: Package name does not match the expected format. Expected format is '/<namespace>/<package_name>'  or just a single package name as a string. If namespace is not specified package name should starts with '$', 'Z', 'Y' or 'SAP'. Only alphanumeric and _ symbols are allowed
package.invalidRepositoryNamespace: Both the SAPUI5 ABAP Repository and the Package that will be used should start in the same way, i.e. a namespace or capital letters 'Z', 'Y' or 'SAP'
package.invalidStartingPrefix: Entered package can start with either namespace, '$', 'Z', 'Y' or 'SAP'
package.notCloudPackage: The package entered is not meant to be used for cloud deployments. You should either use cloud package or go back to the project type selection and select On Premise

adp.invalidAction: Action should contain only alphanumerical characters and '_' up to 60 characters.
adp.invalidSemanticObject: Semantic Object should contain only alphanumerical characters and '_' up to 30 characters.
adp.annotationFileAlreadyExists: There is already an annotation file with the same name, please choose another file or rename the file and select it again
